snippet: Willie Nelson, Snoop Dogg, Armie Hammer and Fiona Apple were all previously arrested at the United States Border Patrol checkpoint near Sierra Blanca, Tex., where authorities said they had found drugs and a loaded gun on Nelly's tour bus.
abstract: Willie Nelson, Snoop Dogg, Armie Hammer and Fiona Apple were all previously arrested at the United States Border Patrol checkpoint near Sierra Blanca, Tex., where authorities said they had found drugs and a loaded gun on Nelly's tour bus.

headline.main: Nelly Is Latest Performer Ensnared at West Texas Checkpoint
headline.print_headline: Another Musician Finds Trouble in Texas
